content.html: #Moviedle today was BULLSHIT! I guessed "Pride & Prejudice" first go and it was wrong, but then after two more guesses went "Pride AND Prejudice" and it was right but to top it all off, THIS WAS THE POSTER IT SHOWED. I WAS ROBBED.
content.value:
#Moviedle today was BULLSHIT!

I guessed "Pride & Prejudice" first go and it was wrong, but then after two more guesses went "Pride AND Prejudice" and it was right but to top it all off, THIS WAS THE POSTER IT SHOWED.

I WAS ROBBED.
